title: 2D Platformer X: Side Scroller
creator: Run And Gun Free Android Games

extendedInfo.description: WARNING !! - THIS GAME IS MEGA HARD !!âââ 2D Platformer X - a classic super mario bros style 2D side scrolling platform game. Jump, run and dash from platform to platform, avoid all the lasers, limbo under chainsaws and through the sky to find ways to get the goal. Get the best time possible in each level.Built for lovers of the pacman style 8 bit era. âââ---------------------------------------------------â Similar controls to classic games like Super Mario Bros and Contra Evolutionâ Atari 2600 / arcade style pixel art and soundâ A wide variety of levels to play throughâ Collect coins to unlock levels and other itemsâ Mega challenging - nimble fingers required :)REVIEWS---------------------------------------------------âââââ "Man, this game is so awesome! Level one is pretty hard. The hardest is the climbing part. It is a really good game. Cute running animation too i recommend it to friends" - 2d game boy - June, 7, 2013âââââ "perfection... ever since I got the game I could not put it Down you have to get this game this is so awesome! you will be dumb not to get it ;) x" - braid s - June, 18, 2013HOW TO PLAY---------------------------------------------------- Your quest is to reach the goal in each level. Don't die!!- Tap left, right and jump with your fingers to run and lep over danger objects.- Collect coins so you can unlock more levels.- Use the teleporter button to go to the end of a level if it's too hard.Players who love platforming games like Leps World 2, Superbrothers and Super Meat Boy, will love this game too.Tested on Galaxy S4, S3, Google Nexus One, Sony Xperia 2, and Kindle Fire HD. Any bugs please send to games@cobaltplaygames.com

reviews.title: Seriously? Ads and auto purchases?
reviews.comment: Update: the app definitely tried to purchase something at the end of the game, I had clicked nothing to initiate it and did not cancel anything - you need to look into that. Really, you don\'t need as many adverts, they are everywhere. Make it about the game, people will buy IAP items or click adverts if they like it.
reviews.author: Andy Hewitt

reviews.title: Fun and hard
reviews.comment: Very hard, but controls feel very nice and fluid. Nice work!
reviews.author: Hunter Krech

reviews.title: Bad bugs
reviews.comment: When I try to play, I press a button and then it goes to the menu
reviews.author: Alex Clarke

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Wonderful game.. hardcore and fun to play.. Please add some retro music to it.. :D
reviews.author: Bikash Agarwal

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Whenever i am in the middle of the game it says that my  purcase failed and I fall and die the adds are endless
reviews.author: An Vr

reviews.title: Def challenging
reviews.comment: Too hard and frustrating for me although can see it would appeal to younger and certain audience.level design is good would also be good to have an option to start level near to where u died instead of restarting the whole level.
reviews.author: David Appledore
